title: Gatekeeper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Canned- (Day) Target a player. One random ability or attribute they have is nullified for the night. The target will be informed of which ability/attribute was nullified at the start of the night.
Gatekeep!- (Night) [Cheat] Target up to two players. All actions, besides attacks, used on the chosen player(s) will fail.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -Abilities that fail as a result of Gatekeep! will receive a generic ability failed message.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Pave the way for a C.O.G.S takeover of the Town! (Normal REF goal)

desc:
Post 4010
*Clearly, thou doth not owneth an air fryeth contraption.*
